title: Why the Sermon on the Mount Makes Pastors into Liars
description:
What does it do to your soul to have to stand up and proclaim what you can hardly live yourself? This is responding to  JBP's New Year's Q/A Question 4 on church. Following https://youtu.be/1pNn91Ewzbc and my video https://youtu.be/ZdjBvSqPWCc 

Why people hate the Sermon on the Mount http://andynaselli.com/why-people-hate-the-sermon-on-the-mount 

https://www.amazon.com/Teaching-Stone-Talk-Expeditions-Encounters-ebook/dp/B000W968PU 

https://paulvanderklay.me/2012/06/07/annie-dillard-quote-on-crash-helmets-needed-for-worship/
